channel.description: @RichRogers, @Luiz, and I discuss *Hogwarts RPG*, T*hirsty Sword Lesbians*, and *World Wide Wrestling*. We also talk about Luiz's excellent rpg *Melody of a Never-ending Summer*. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/hogwarts-rpg-thirsty-sword-lesbians-world-wide-wrestling

item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

@RichRogers, @Luiz, and I discuss Hogwarts RPG, Thirsty Sword Lesbians, and World Wide Wrestling. We also talk about Luiz’s excellent rpg Melody of a Never-ending Summer.

THE GAUNTLET

Hogwarts RPG, Thirsty Sword Lesbians, World Wide Wrestling
